name: Mind The Gap (alpha)
description:
An updated version to Mind the Gap (LD38), now includes a title menu, a tutorial, some fun options (godmode + super fast grapple), a difficulty selector, and music.

Music is courtesy of: http://www.purple-planet.com/

Font is courtesy of: http://www.dafont.com/plump.font

Update: 1.1.1 now includes the ability to jump for fun in the options menu. Check it out, mess around.

Update 1.1.2 now includes health pickups, a new fun mode in the extras menu, two new difficulty levels as well as tweaked difficulty settings, and a few optimizations and bug fixes.
